meta-runner.name: DoIt: SQL Server database
meta-runner.description: Drops, creates and restores SQL server databases

param.name: sqlServer.action
param.spec: select label_2='Drop and Create' data_2='DropAndCreate' data_1='Drop' display='normal' label='Action' data_4='DropAndRestore' label_4='Drop and Restore'

param.name: sqlServer.database.server
param.spec: text description='Name of database server' validationMode='not_empty' label='Database server' display='normal'

param.name: sqlServer.integratedSecurity
param.spec: checkbox checkedValue='$true' description='Check for Windows Authentication, uncheck for SQL Server Authentication' uncheckedValue='$false' label='Integrated Security' display='normal'

param.name: sqlServer.backup.location
param.spec: text description='Path to database backup. Only used if action is Drop and Restore.' validationMode='any' label='Backup location' display='normal'

param.name: sqlServer.timeout
param.spec: text description='Query timeout in seconds (default 120)' validationMode='any' label='Query timeout' display='normal'
